metadata.name: Soul on Fire
metadata.description:
"Kisses from the Soul" is an art collection created by The Jax, that captures fleeting moments of a deep connection between people. Each kiss is a unique dance between souls, an exchange of energy that transcends time and space. These kisses are an expression of the purest essence of human beings, which can be felt and shared through the portal of the soul, the mouth. Let yourself be enchanted by the magic of these "soul kisses" and feel the intensity of the connection they represent.

The licenses for commercial use and exhibitions are exclusive to the artist The Jax. No License / All Rights Reserved
